title: DEEP DIVE: School Choice
description: With kids getting back to school, we thought it was the perfect time for a deep dive on school choice with Denisha Merriweather and Tommy Schultz from the American Federation for Children.
author: hello@ruthlesspodcast.com (Comfortably Smug, Michael Duncan, Josh Holmes, Tommy Schultz, Denisha Merriweather)
